diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $4$ units.
The measure of angle $CAB$ is $37$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is $5$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
The line connecting $C$ and $D$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming the triangle $ACB$.
